LanguageData.FullMetalJacket.label: 일반탄
LanguageData.FullMetalJacket.description: The soft lead core is encased in a harder metal coating, combining a medium amount of stopping power and armor penetration.
LanguageData.ArmorPiercing.label: 관통탄
LanguageData.ArmorPiercing.description: Features a hardened steel penetrator core for increased armor penetration.
LanguageData.HollowPoint.label: HP탄
LanguageData.HollowPoint.description: A hollowed out tip causes the bullet to expand on impact, increasing tissue damage at the cost of armor penetration.
LanguageData.Sabot.label: 전차 관통탄
LanguageData.Sabot.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.
LanguageData.IncendiaryAP.label: 소이탄
LanguageData.IncendiaryAP.description: Filled with an incendiary compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and potentially igniting targets.
LanguageData.ExplosiveAP.label: 폭렬탄
LanguageData.ExplosiveAP.description: Filled with high-explosives that detonate on impact for additional damage.
